Topic.Title: USA FRAUD STREET CASINO WILL CRASH AND BURN & RIOTS IN 2013

Message.Msg: What we experienced in the 1930s was a deflationary depression where billions of dollars were wiped out with a stock market collapse, bond defaults and bank failures. Inflationary money that was created since the formation of the Federal Reserve in 1913 was wiped out. Prices went down. This depression will be different because governments have much more power. They'll try to keep uneconomic operations from collapse, they'll prop them up, as we saw with Fannie Mae and General Motors. They'll create more money to keep the dead men walking. They won't allow the defaults of money market instruments. They will make efforts to maintain the dollar mark on money market funds. They'll attempt to keep building the pyramid higher. It's foolish, indeed idiotic. But that's what they'll do.

Topic.Title: 1987 crash -25 year ago in October....

Message.Msg: Not only can I survive, but I will be adding. Again, an INVESTOR adds to his or her position when it becomes less expensive and the risk/return profile improves. When the market sells the Fed easing news, it is all downhill. Everyone will have an "oh crap" moment realizing there are no inflows at these prices and everyone was waiting for the uncertainty to be removed to sell big volumes... Pretty soon, people will start to realize the Apple, Google and Walmart will all be gunning for an AMZN which simply doesn't generate much FCF anymore. A deflationary environment will be AMZNs downfall...
